title: Crime Alert 10.28.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.28.22
description:
Man beats his girlfriend dead because she's not home when he wakes up.  Hit and run suspect goes on carjacking crime spree. Toddler rescued from crawling into the street when dad passes out. Woman takes a bat to everything in her vicinity.

For more breaking crime and justice news, go to crimeonline.com
